p: Considering the structural and metabolic similarities, the NOAELs for the representative compounds of CG 31, myrcene [01.008], limonene [01.045] and β‐caryophyllene [01.007] were applied, respectively, using read‐across to the compounds within subassessment group II (cis‐β‐ocimene [01.064] and trans‐β‐ocimene [01.018]), group III (γ‐terpinene [01.020], β‐bisabolene [01.028], terpinolene [01.005], α‐terpinene [01.019], α‐phellandrene [01.006], p‐mentha‐3,8‐diene) and group V (β‐pinene [01.003], α‐pinene [01.004], sabinene [01.059], α‐thujene, camphene [01.009], valencene [01.017] and δ‐3‐carene [01.029]) (EFSA CEF Panel, 2015a, b).
